Articles.Content:
I have a question about Firespitter plugins, I have b9 aerospace installed works fine and everything, I just wanted to install the new KOSMOS mod and install that but it looks like I will be overwriting the Firespitter plugin that comes with B9, is there a way around this?

Does it matter? What do I do?

Thank you

They are not the same size , so I am assuming they are different.

Edited August 12, 2013 by Xzabath
Question answered
Squad no longer officially supports modded installations so try asking in the add-on support subforum.
They are the same file. If you overwrite the original, nothing will happen. If you do, nothing will happen.

They are the same file. If you overwrite the original, nothing will happen. If you do, nothing will happen.

Not entirely true. SNJO has been updating Firespitter and there are now several versions of the .dll in circulation. The one packaged with B9 gave me problems. I suggest the OP just get Firespitters latest update and use that one.
Thank you for the answer, sorry about wrong forum topic.
